result.execSummary:
The defendant Kevin D. Kovacic was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
10 days in Marquette County Jail with huber, consecutive to any other sentence. 
Report on or before October 5, 2015 by 7:00 p.m. clean & sober.
Consecutive to: consecutive to any other sentence
payment plan of $50 per month commencing on or before 9/5/15. Payment plan fee has been added

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kevin D. Kovacic

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: MARQUETTE COUNTY DNA PROOF OF SUBMISSION

Defendant Kevin D. Kovacic in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee states that an offer was provided.  Defendant would like to accept the DA's offer.    Atty Hendee states plea agreement.  Defendant agrees.    Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant waives their right to an attorney.    Court finds waiver made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.
Defendant enters a No Contest plea.
  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.  Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds defendant guilty.

BY THE COURT:  Court orders 10 days in the Marquette County Jail w/huber; consecutive to any other sentence
  Report on or before October 5, 2015 by 7:00pm, clean & sober.
Credit = 4 days
Court Costs = $243.00
DNA Sample + $200.00 Surcharge
  Defendant agrees to the $15.00 payment plan fee.
Payment Plan:  $50.00/month commencing in September

ADDRESS INFO for Kevin D. Kovacic
Current: 457 S Oxford St, Wautoma, WI 54982-8463 United States  (Effective: 08-06-2015)
Prior: W2105 Eagle Road, Neshkoro, WI 54960

Pre-trial conference at 07-14-2015 02:00 pm.
Return date at 08-06-2015 03:30 pm.
*No contact with Johnnie or Dawn Sabel.

Defendant Kevin D. Kovacic by video, in custody.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  BY THE COURT:  Court finds probable cause to support the charges.  BY THE COURT:  Court enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant.
Atty Hendee requests signature bond with conditions.  BY THE COURT:  Signature bond set.
  Defendant waives their right to an attorney in order to have a conference with the District Attorney.  Court questions defendant and finds waiver of counsel is being made freely, voluntarily & intelligently.  Return date scheduled for August 6, 2015 at 03:30 pm.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 14, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
